e1.name: The Higher You Fly, the Harder You Fall
e1.description: When the target enemy's current HP is greater than or equal to 50% of their Max HP, Dan Heng's CRIT Rate increases by 12%.

e2.description: Reduces Talent cooldown by 1 turn.

e3.name: Seen and Unseen

e4.name: Roaring Dragon and Soaring Sun
e4.description: When Dan Heng uses his Ultimate to defeat an enemy, his next action is Advanced Forward by 100%

e5.name: A Drop of Rain Feeds a Torrent

e6.name: The Troubled Soul Lies in Wait

e1.name: Memory of You

If the enemy is defeated by the Butterfly Flurry DMG triggered by other allies' attacks, Seele's Talent will not be triggered.

e1.name: Blade Cuts the Deepest in Hell
e1.description:
Blade's Ultimate deals additionally increased DMG to a single enemy target, with the increased amount equal to 150% of Blade's total HP loss in the current battle.
The total HP Blade has lost in the current battle is capped at 90% of his Max HP. This value will be reset and re-accumulated after his Ultimate has been used.

e2.name: Ten Thousand Sorrows From One Broken Dream
e2.description: When Blade is in the Hellscape state, his CRIT Rate increases by 15%.

e3.name: Hardened Blade Bleeds Coldest Shade
e3.description:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.name: Rejected by Death, Infected With Life
e4.description: When Blade's current HP drops to 50% or lower of his Max HP, increases his Max HP by 20%. Stacks up to 2 time(s).

e5.name: Death By Ten Lords' Gaze
e5.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e6.name: Reborn Into an Empty Husk
e6.description: The maximum number of Charge stacks is reduced to 4. The DMG of the follow-up attack triggered by Blade's Talent additionally increases by 50% of his Max HP.

e1.name: Tethered to Sky
e1.description: Increases the stackable Righteous Heart count by 4, and gains 1 extra stack of Righteous Heart for each hit during an attack.

e2.name: Imperium On Cloud Nine
e2.description: After using his Ultimate, Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's action is Advanced Forward by 100% and gains 1 extra Squama Sacrosancta.

e3.name: Clothed in Clouds
e3.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.name: Zephyr's Bliss
e4.description: The buff effect granted by Outroar lasts until the end of this character's next turn.

e5.name: Fall is the Pride
e5.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.name: Reign, Returned
e6.description: After any other ally uses their Ultimate, the Imaginary RES PEN of Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae's next Fulgurant Leap attack increases by 20%. This effect can stack up to 3 time(s).

e1.name: Dominus Pacis
e1.description: The Knowledge effect increases CRIT DMG by 30%.

e2.name: Optimus Felix
e2.description: If any team member is struck by a killing blow while Matrix of Prescience is active, then all allies who were struck by a killing blow during this action will not be knocked down, and 70% of their Max HP is immediately restored. This effect can trigger 1 time per battle.

e3.name: Apex Nexus
e3.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.name: Fortuna Stellaris

e5.name: Arbiter Primus

e6.name: Omnia Vita
e6.description: Once Matrix of Prescience is activated, it will keep a tally of the total HP lost by all team members in the current battle. Fu Xuan's Ultimate DMG will increase by 200% of this tally of HP loss.

e1.name: Morning of Snow Hike
e1.description: When healing allies with HP equal to or lower than 50%, Lynx's Outgoing Healing increases by 20%. This effect also works on continuous healing.

e2.name: Noon of Portable Furnace
e2.description: A target with "Survival Response" can resist debuff application for 1 time(s).

e3.name: Afternoon of Avalanche Beacon
e3.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.description: Additionally boosts the Max HP increasing effect of "Survival Response" by an amount equal to 6% of Lynx's Max HP and increases Effect RES by 30%.

e1.name: Moon Crashes Tianguan Gate

e2.name: Crescent Shadows Qixing Dipper
e2.description: After using Ultimate, increases the DMG of the next Enhanced Skill by 80%.

e3.name: Halfmoon Gapes Mercurial Haze
e3.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.name: Lunarlance Shines Skyward Dome
e4.description: During the Spectral Transmigration state, the ATK gained from consuming allies' HP is additionally increased by 90% of the total HP consumed from the entire team. The cap for ATK gained this way also increases by 30%.

e5.name: Night Shades Astral Radiance
e5.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

e1.description: When Skill is used, there is a 100% base chance to reduce the attacked target enemy's Effect RES by 10% for 2 turn(s).

e2.name: Sealed in Tail, Wraith Subdued
e2.description: If Houhou possesses Divine Provision when an ally is struck by a killing blow, the ally will not be knocked down, and their HP will immediately be restored by an amount equal to 50% of their Max HP. This reduces the duration of Divine Provision by 1 turn. This effect can only be triggered 2 time(s) per battle.

e6.description: When using the Ultimate, increases own DMG by 30%, lasting until the end of the turn. In addition, the next time the Skill is used, recovers 1 Skill Point(s) for the team.

e1.name: Seven Pillars of Wisdom
e1.description: While Black Swan is active in battle, enemies afflicted with Wind Shear, Bleed, Burn, or Shock will have their corresponding Wind, Physical, Fire, or Lightning RES respectively reduced by 25%.

e2.description: When an enemy target afflicted with Arcana is defeated, there is a 100% base chance of inflicting 6 stack(s) of Arcana on adjacent targets.

e3.description:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e4.description: While in the Epiphany state, enemy targets have their Effect RES reduced by 10%. And at the start of their turn or when they get defeated, Black Swan regenerates 8 Energy. This Energy Regeneration effect can only trigger up to 1 time while Epiphany lasts. And this trigger count resets after the enemy gets inflicted with Epiphany again.

Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

When enemy targets get attacked by Black Swan's allies, Black Swan has a 65% base chance of inflicting 1 stack of Arcana on the target.
Each time Black Swan inflicts Arcana on an enemy target, there is a 50% fixed chance to additionally increase the number of Arcana stacks afflicted this time by 1.

Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

e6.description: The CRIT DMG Boost effect of Sparkle's Skill additionally increases by 30% of Sparkle's CRIT DMG, and when she uses her Skill, the CRIT DMG Boost effect will apply to all allies currently with Cipher. When Sparkle uses her Ultimate, this effect will spread to all allies with Cipher should the allied target have the CRIT DMG increase effect provided by the Skill active on them.

Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

The DMG dealt by Basic ATK and Skill will also be considered as Ultimate DMG and can reduce enemy toughness regardless of Weakness Types. When Weakness is broken, triggers the Lightning Weakness Break effect.
